mapper.select: SELECT d.doc_id, d.emp_id, d.doc_type, d.doc_sts, l.lea_type, l.lea_start_date, l.lea_end_date, l.lea_end_date-l.lea_start_date lea_used_day, l.lea_con FROM ( SELECT doc_id, emp_id, doc_type, doc_sts FROM document WHERE doc_type = 'doc_type_01' AND doc_sts = 'doc_sts_02' AND emp_id = #{empId} ) d JOIN leave_doc l ON d.doc_id = l.doc_id ORDER BY l.lea_start_date DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
